headline: FinTech and Crypto 2026 outlook: Mizuho lists 6 key themes
summary: Investing.com -- Fintech, payments, and crypto have entered 2026 with “major political, macro, and product catalysts,” Mizuho analyst Dan Dolev told clients in a note on Friday, outlining six themes that could shape the sector this year.
